SummaryEnglish: An ambitious woman of humble background and stunning beauty is determined to change her poor situation, using her seductive skills on a millionaire doctor.

1.SummaryEnglish: Rubi is a beautiful young university student who lives together with her mother, Mrs. Refugio, and her sister, Cristina, in a poor neighborhood.

2.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro falls in love with Rubi after their first encounter at the airport. Hector manages to meet Maribel. Maribel tells Hector about her disability. Refugio fears that Rubi will get used to feeling like a person with money.

3.SummaryEnglish: Rubi gets upset because Alejandro shows no interest in her. Cristina suspects that Rubi spent the night with a strange man. Hector looks for a way to show Arturo the great love he feels for Maribel.

4.SummaryEnglish: Elisa and Genaro are surprised when they discover that Maribel has a disability in her leg. Arturo thinks that Hector is just playing with Maribel's feelings. Rubi gets Alejandro interested in her.

5.SummaryEnglish: Rubi promises Cristina that she will do whatever is necessary for Refugio to improve her health. Cayetano begins to feel an interest in Cristina. Hector decides to propose to Maribel.

6.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro formalizes his relationship with Rubi. Maribel fears that Hector might stop loving her because of her disability. Hector asks Maribel to marry him.

7.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro tries to spend the night with Rubi. Maribel is happy because Arturo has accepted her engagement to Hector. Paco is sad when he finds out that Rubi is Alejandro's girlfriend.

8.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro gets jealous when he sees Rubi hugging Hector. Rubi confesses to Maribel that Genaro does not accept her relationship with Alejandro.

9.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro looks for a way to win Rubi back. Rubi fears that Genaro and Elisa will begin to feel affection for Maribel. Genaro decides to support Hector's relationship with Maribel.

10.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro assures Marco that the love he feels for Rubi is unique. Cristina tells Lola how interested she is in Cayetano. Maribel and Hector prepare a dinner to celebrate their engagement.

11.SummaryEnglish: Hector accepts that Rubi works for him. Rubi gets upset when she finds out that Cristina is dating Cayetano. Alejandro assures Hector that Rubi is an opportunist.

12.SummaryEnglish: Rubi begins to work as Hector's new secretary. Cayetano carries out his plans so that Cristina falls in love with him. Hector gets upset because Arturo keeps meddling in his relationship with Maribel.

13.SummaryEnglish: Genaro spends time with his lover and his daughter. Maribel promises Hector that she will help him prevent Arturo from intervening in his business. Rubi manages to seduce Hector.

14.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro looks for a way to get a new job. Lilia asks Genaro to tell Luis the truth about his origins. Luis tries to get Yago to accept his new project for the creation of a new hotel.

15.SummaryEnglish: Rubi looks for a way for Hector to end his relationship with Maribel. Alejandro is upset when he finds out that Dr. Bermudez took over his project. Victoria begins to feel attracted to Alejandro.

16.SummaryEnglish: Cristina tells Refugio about her interest in Cayetano. Rubi makes Hector believe that she is interested in him. Lorena suffers when she sees Saul dating Ingrid.

17.SummaryEnglish: Pancha thinks Rubi is trying to make Hector fall in love. Marco assures Alejandro that his interest in Cristina is real. Genaro discovers that Luis is Rubi's friend.

18.SummaryEnglish: Rubi confesses to Hector the love she feels for him. Genaro is surprised when he finds Hector making out with Rubi in his office. Eugenia thinks that Rubi could be interested in Paco.

19.SummaryEnglish: Rubi continues to seduce Hector. Arturo gets upset when he finds out that Cayetano is courting Cristina. Maribel's wedding is canceled because Hector forgot to deliver his papers to the church.

20.SummaryEnglish: Dr. Bermudez carries out his plans to ruin Alejandro's project. Rubi tries to end Maribel's engagement with Hector. Sofia discovers that her mother is losing her memory.

21.SummaryEnglish: Ignacio and Sofia look for a way to tell Carla that she is losing her memory. Alejandro is surprised when he discovers that thanks to Rubi, Maribel resumed her therapies. Hector assures Genaro that Rubi is in love with him.

22.SummaryEnglish: Maribel and Lorena ask Rubi to be the model for their new campaign. Ingrid tries to humiliate Cristina when she discovers that Cayetano is her boyfriend. Arturo decides to pay Rubi's university.

23.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro assures Hector that Rubi is still in love with him. In order to forget about Rubi, Hector decides to marry Maribel.

24.SummaryEnglish: Genaro agrees to be Arturo's new partner. Hector decides to end his relationship with Rubi to avoid having problems with Maribel. Alejandro asks Rubi to give him a new opportunity to make her fall in love.

25.SummaryEnglish: Rubi assures Genaro that Hector loves her. Ignacio and Carla start a new life in the city. Rubi gets jealous when she sees Alejandro with Sofia. Genaro fears that Luis will formalize his relationship with Sofia.

26.SummaryEnglish: Rubi refuses to accept that Hector marries Maribel. Rubi tries to get Cristina not to attend Maribel's wedding. Hector gets jealous when he finds out that Rubi resumed her relationship with Alejandro.

27.SummaryEnglish: Hector complains to Rubi for having resumed her courtship with Alejandro. Ingrid gets upset when she sees Saul courting Rubi. Rubi is afraid that Refugio will find out that she has been spending her tuition money.

28.SummaryEnglish: Rubi steals a large amount of money from Mrs. Lola. Sofia and Alejandro suffer after learning that Carla has Alzheimer's. Valeria asks Paco to forgive her for having thought that he was interested in her.

29.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro gives Maribel new orthotics so that she can walk better. Rubi unexpectedly runs into Hector during her school trip. Refugio suspects that Rubi stole money from Mrs. Lola.

30.SummaryEnglish: Rubi assures Loreto that Hector will end his engagement with Maribel. Mrs. Lola complains to Rubi for having stolen her money. Alejandro assures Hector that he is no longer interested in Rubi.

31.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro is upset when he discovers that Rubi and Hector fled the country. Maribel suffers when she sees Rubi kissing Hector at the airport. Hector and Rubí spend their first night together.

32.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro suffers because Rubi betrayed him. Maribel falls into depression after not being able to marry Hector. Sofia decides to end her relationship with Luis.

33.SummaryEnglish: Yago, Luis and Hector get a new architect to join their project. Rubi and Hector tell Luis the reasons why they fled the city. Sonia suspects that Rubi is interested in Yago.

34.SummaryEnglish: Elisa assures Hector that Rubi is only with him out of interest. Rubi asks Genaro not to interfere in her life or else she will tell Elisa that he has another family.

35.SummaryEnglish: Hector visits Maribel at her house to ask her to forgive him for abandoning her. Maribel is shocked when Hector confesses that she married Rubi. Refugio asks Rubi to forget about her and her family.

36.SummaryEnglish: Genaro fears that Elisa will find out that Luis is his son after seeing them together at the hotel. Rubi tells Loreto that she has not stopped loving Alejandro. Cayetano asks Cristina to marry him.

37.SummaryEnglish: Rubi is surprised when she discovers that Alejandro works for her new friends. Hector hits Alejandro after seeing him with Rubi. Victoria looks for a way to prove that Alejandro is a good doctor.

38.SummaryEnglish: Refugio is kicked out of her apartment. Yago begins to feel a strong attraction for Rubi. Lilia decides to live in Querétaro to spend more time with Genaro. Sofia slaps Rubi after finding her at the hotel.

39.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro asks Sofia not to get closer to Rubi. Dr. Bermudez asks Lara to help him take over Alejandro's project. Rubi thinks that Sonia is interested in Alejandro. Alejandro gets upset when he hears Yago speak ill of Rubi.

40.SummaryEnglish: Genaro decides to end his relationship with Elisa to avoid having problems with Lilia. Cayetano is sad for not being able to give Cristina a good life. Hector gets upset because Elisa keeps trying to end her marriage.

41.SummaryEnglish: Rubi assures Alejandro that she loves him. Luis is happy because Genaro has accepted his relationship with Sofia. Rubi gets upset when she finds out that Hector's godparents want to end her marriage. Cayetano starts working as a taxi driver.

42.SummaryEnglish: Yago buys Rubi clothes to show his interest in her. Alejandro decides to participate in the medicine contest. Rubi tells Alejandro the reasons why she married Hector.

43.SummaryEnglish: Genaro tries to get Hector to make Rubi believe that he has no money. Elisa suffers because Genaro asked her for a divorce. Rubi fears that because of Genaro, Hector could be ruined.

44.SummaryEnglish: Paco confesses his love to Lorena. Rubi fears that Maribel will try to win Hector back. Sofia and Hector are shocked when they discover that Genaro is Luis's father.

45.SummaryEnglish: Luis gets upset when he finds out that Elisa is Genaro's wife. Rubi looks for a way to make Elisa know that Genaro has another family. Due to a heart attack, Genaro is rushed to the hospital.

46.SummaryEnglish: Rubi gets upset because Genaro could take over Hector's fortune. Elisa is surprised when she discovers that Lilia is Genaro's wife. Genaro confesses to Ignacio that Luis is not his son.

47.SummaryEnglish: Rubi gets jealous when she finds Hector kissing Maribel. Maribel decides to start a new life away from Hector. Lilia complains to Arturo for having abandoned her.

48.SummaryEnglish: Cayetano announces to his family that he will soon marry Cristina. Hector agrees to be Yago's partner. Rubi assures Yago that she is not interested in him. Lilia decides to end her marriage with Genaro.

49.SummaryEnglish: Rubi makes a plan to prevent Cayetano from getting out of jail. Arturo promises Lilia that he will help her get over her breakup with Genaro. Refugio suspects that Rubi is interested in Yago.

50.SummaryEnglish: Maribel is surprised when Elisa tells her that Rubi has a concussion. Paco prepares a very special dinner for Lorena. Gerardo tries to get Alejandro away from Rubi. Sonia suffers when she discovers that Alejandro continues to love Rubi.

51.SummaryEnglish: Rubi refuses to be Yago's lover. Elisa assures Lilia that she will not give Genaro a divorce. Arturo decides to finance Alejandro's new project. Lilia confesses to Genaro that Arturo is Luis's real father.

52.SummaryEnglish: Saul looks for a way to win back Lorena. Hector asks Genaro to make Elisa her new worker. Rubi is surprised when she discovers that Cristina is expecting Cayetano's baby.

53.SummaryEnglish: Rubi assures Luis that Maribel is responsible for ruining his parents' businesses. Maribel looks for a way to get Cayetano out of jail. Rubi and her family say goodbye to Refugio at her funeral.

54.SummaryEnglish: Cristina accuses Rubi of having caused Refugio's death. Luis decides to work with Arturo after learning that Genaro was unfaithful to Lilia. Rubi assures Hector that Genaro will put one of his companies in Lilia's name.

55.SummaryEnglish: Genaro fears going to jail because he is accused of having had two marriages. Maribel begins to feel attracted to Alejandro. Victoria tells Paco that Cayetano might not get out of jail.

56.SummaryEnglish: Rubi surprises her classmates when she announces that she is the owner of one of the best hotels in Mexico. Sonia confesses to Alejandro that Yago abused her. Yago tries to get Rubí to travel with him to Italy.

57.SummaryEnglish: Elisa decides to divorce Genaro to avoid having more contact with him. Luis gets upset after seeing Lilia kissing Arturo. Alejandro asks Sonia to marry him.

58.SummaryEnglish: Maribel suffers because Alejandro is not interested in her. Genaro is sad when Lilia tells him that she has started a new relationship. Alejandro breaks the news to his family that he will soon marry Sonia.

59.SummaryEnglish: Rubi make a plan to prevent Alejandro from marrying Sonia. Sonia fears that Rubi will try to win Alejandro back. Arturo asks Elisa to give him the opportunity to make her fall in love. Marco refuses to accept that Cristina is still in love with Cayetano.

60.SummaryEnglish: Rubi is furious when she finds out that Alejandro married Sonia. Cristina makes fun of Rubi after seeing her try to ruin Alejandro's wedding. Alejandro and Sonia celebrate their marriage with a big party in the company of their family and friends.

61.TitleEnglish: En busca de una nueva oportunidad
61.SummaryEnglish: Rubi is afraid that Hector wants to divorce her. Lilia fears that Luis and Maribel will find out that they are half-siblings. Cristina decides to marry Marco. After reuniting with his family, Luis decides to stop drinking.

62.SummaryEnglish: Rubi gets upset because Hector plans to leave her broke. Lilia decides to end her relationship with Gabriel to avoid having problems with her daughter. Rubi assures Sonia that Maribel is in love with Alejandro.

63.SummaryEnglish: Sonia gets jealous because Alejandro spends time with Maribel. After learning that Cristina can not stop thinking about Cayetano, Marco decides to get away from her. Rubi makes Sonia believe that Alejandro spent the night with her.

64.SummaryEnglish: Yago prepares a romantic dinner so he can spend the night with Rubi. Alejandro hits Yago hard for trying to abuse Rubi. Sonia decides to end her marriage because Alejandro can not stop thinking about Rubi.

65.SummaryEnglish: Yago abuses Rubi. Rubi suffers after learning that Alejandro has disappeared. Nati gets upset when she sees Lilia with another man.

66.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro is rushed to the hospital after being beaten by some thugs. Cayetano is happy when he sees that Cristina had a daughter. Alejandro suffers when he finds out that Rubi spent the night with Yago.

67.SummaryEnglish: Cristina fears that Fernanda has contact with Rubi. Hector feels guilty after learning that Yago tried to abuse Rubi. Arturo refuses to accept that Maribel has a relationship with Luis.

68.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro suffers after finding Sonia dead in her garden. Marco tries to propose to Cristina, but unexpected news ruins the moment. Family and friends of Sonia say goodbye to her at her funeral.

69.SummaryEnglish: Rubi is afraid that Alejandro will find out that she was there at the time Sonia died. Rubi is surprised when she finds out that Sonia was expecting Alejandro's baby. Rubi tells Maribel that Luis is her half brother.

70.SummaryEnglish: Rubi tries to get Alejandro to help her prevent Maribel from having a relationship with Luis. Hector tries to reconcile with Alejandro. Lilia confesses to Arturo that Luis is his son.

71.SummaryEnglish: Genaro confesses to Luis that Maribel is his half-sister. Hector finds out that Rubi is taking birth control pills to avoid getting pregnant. Rubi suspects that the Count is responsible for having killed Yago.

72.SummaryEnglish: Luis complains to Lilia for not having told him the truth about his origin. Rubi tries to get Cayetano to prevent Cristina from marrying Marco.

73.SummaryEnglish: Victoria tries to get Lorena to reconcile with Paco. Rubi asks Cristina not to marry Marco. Hector confronts Alejandro to ask him to stay away from Rubi.

74.SummaryEnglish: Rubi tries to sell the shares of Hector's hotel without him finding out. Hector thinks Rubi is cheating on him with Alejandro. Cristina gets upset because Rubi continues to have contact with Fernanda.

75.SummaryEnglish: Cayetano manages to reunite with Cristina. Hector looks for a way to reconcile with Rubi. Rubi tricks Hector, making him sign a document where she sells his shares to the Count.

76.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro thinks that Hector hit Rubi. Cristina complains to Cayetano for having abandoned her. Ernesto carries out his plans to ruin Maribel's projects.

77.SummaryEnglish: Marco suffers when he hears Cristina confess her love to Cayetano. Rubi asks Lucio to help her become a business woman. Cristina decides to marry Cayetano.

78.SummaryEnglish: Cristina and Cayetano celebrate their wedding with a party in the neighborhood in the company of their friends. Rubi travels to Cancún to meet Alejandro again.

79.SummaryEnglish: Elisa thinks that Hector might be interested in Elena. Saul travels to Cancun to show Sofia the love he feels for her. Rubi manages to win Alejandro back.

80.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro asks Rubi to tell Hector about their relationship. Rubi assures Alejandro that Hector will refuse to give her a divorce. Luis looks for a way to win Sofia back.

81.SummaryEnglish: Hector makes it clear to Elena that he is not interested in her. Marco is upset because Cayetano wants to distance him from Fernanda. Sofia tells Maribel that Rubi and Alejandro are together on the beach.

82.SummaryEnglish: Maribel assures Sofia that Rubi is guilty of Sonia's death. After learning that Rubi is unfaithful to Hector, Lucio tries to abuse her. Marco is upset when he finds out that Alejandro plans to marry Rubi.

83.SummaryEnglish: Lore tells Paco the reasons why she does not want to marry him. Hector asks Rubi to get away from him after learning that she caused Sonia's death. Maribel suffers when she sees Pancha dying in the hospital.

84.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro denounces Rubi for having caused Sonia's death. Elena asks Marco for help to get over her fear of spiders. Rubi is arrested by the police for homicide.

85.SummaryEnglish: Lucio gets the protection order to ensure that Rubi is released. Alejandro suspects that Esteban is in love with Maribel. Rubi is afraid that Lucio will leave her bankrupt.

86.SummaryEnglish: Rubi sues Hector. Elena tells Hector that Rubi sold his share of the hotel.

87.SummaryEnglish: Rubi discovers that she is pregnant. Alejandro discovers that Rubi did not cause Sonia's death. Héctor tries to get Rubi to return with him.

88.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro thinks that the baby Rubi is expecting is his. Maribel confesses her love to Alejandro.

89.SummaryEnglish: Hector confronts Rubi to find out the reasons why he sold his shares. Rubi confesses to Maribel that the baby she is expecting is Alejandro's.

90.SummaryEnglish: Rubi makes Hector believe that the baby she is expecting is his. Ernesto falls in love with Maribel. Ernesto looks for a way to get rid of Alejandro.

91.SummaryEnglish: After learning that Rubi is expecting Hector's baby, Elena confesses her love for him. Hector discovers that the baby Rubi is expecting is Alejandro's.

92.SummaryEnglish: The Count confesses his interest in Maribel. Hector keeps Rubi locked up to prevent her from having contact with Alejandro.

93.SummaryEnglish: With the help of the Count, Ernesto's father manages to get out of jail. Rubi asks Elisa to help her escape from the confinement in which Hector is keeping her.

94.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro wants to help Ernesto to finish his medical studies. Bermudez begins his revenge by poisoning Alejandro.

95.SummaryEnglish: Hector makes Rubi believe that he tried to poison Alejandro. The plumber helps Rubi escape from her house.

96.SummaryEnglish: Rubi asks Cayetano to help her hide from Hector. Genaro confesses to Héctor to improve his behavior.

97.SummaryEnglish: Cayetano tells Hector why he was imprisoned. Alejandro's mother's health is critical, since she cannot remember anything. Lore and Paco help Ingrid.

98.SummaryEnglish: Elena asks Hector for an apology for having believed him guilty of poisoning Alejandro. Elena discovers that Héctor had Rubi locked up. Ingrid begins to fall in love with Paco.

99.SummaryEnglish: Cayetano accepts that Fernanda has a relationship with Marco. Genaro helps Rubi get away from Hector. Alejandro finds out that the son Rubi is expecting is his.

100.SummaryEnglish: Alejandro tells Rubi about his interest in Maribel. Elisa gets upset when she finds out all the bad things Hector has done.

101.SummaryEnglish: After learning that the child Rubi is expecting is Alejandro's, Maribel decides to get away from him. The Count assures Arturo that he will conquer Maribel. Hector decides to start a new life with Elena.

102.SummaryEnglish: Hector decides to travel with Elena. Rubi makes Alejandro believe that she is not interested in her fortune. Rubi suffers an accident while trying to save Fernanda. Rubi loses her baby.

103.SummaryEnglish: Rubi decides not to tell anyone that she lost her baby. Genaro opposes Luis going to Switzerland with Sofia. Maribel starts dating the Count and Elena looks for her mother.

104.SummaryEnglish: Bermudez tries to get rid of Maribel. Alejandro agrees to marry Rubi only because she will have his son. Elena finds out how her sister really died.

105.SummaryEnglish: Hector makes it clear to Alejandro that he will never give Rubi a divorce. Rubi's actions have consequences with Alejandro, and she finds Hector and Elena in bed.

106.SummaryEnglish: Elena decides to end things with Hector because he was not able to defend her in front of Rubi. The Count confesses to Maribel that he is in love with her. Alejandro goes to look for Maribel in Las Vegas.

107.SummaryEnglish: Rubi makes Hector believe that she lost his baby because of him. Alejandro and Maribel are about to get married, but an unforeseen event makes them return to Mexico. Marco tells Cayetano that he has a brain tumor.

108.SummaryEnglish: Cayetano suffers when he learns that he has two months to live and therefore asks Marco to take care of Cristina. Alejandro accuses Hector of having killed his son and hits him. Lorena and Paco start having problems because of Ingrid.

109.SummaryEnglish: Rubi confesses to Hector that she did not lose her baby because of him, that fills him with courage and attacks her, however he investigates and discovers that she has been lying to him for a long time.

110.SummaryEnglish: Hector arrives seriously injured at the hospital, but unfortunately dies during the operation. Family and Friends blame Alejandro for Hector's death. Loreto is terrified to find out what Rubí really is like.

111.SummaryEnglish: Rubi is sure that Hector died because Alejandro intervened on her behalf. In the face of Hector's death, Rubi behaves indifferently and sinically. Lucio charges Rubi for all the favors, while Maribel hears that Elisa will sue Alejandro.

112.SummaryEnglish: Paco admits that he was attracted to Ingrid, so Lorena decides to leave him. The investigations into the death of Hector, result in the supply of a medicine. Rubi accepts Lucio's proposal to get Alejandro out of jail.

113.SummaryEnglish: Rubi blackmails Maribel with Alejandro's freedom. Ernesto discovers that his father is to blame for Hector's death. Thanks to Rubi, Bermudez kills Lucio and his son.

114.SummaryEnglish: When Lucio dies, Elena keeps all of Rubi's properties and she loses everything in the stock market. Genaro has proof that Hector did not kill Rubi's baby and she suffers a serious accident by not letting Alejandro go. Elena finds out that she is pregnant.

115.SummaryEnglish: Rubi is left with terrible consequences of the accident and her thirst for revenge grows more and more every day. Cayetano dies and Marco takes care of Cristina and Fernanda. Maribel and Alejandro finally get married but Rubi is still present in her life.
